duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in the engineering to support call recording (audio and screen) within the Genesys Platform.
Design and implement interaction flows in Interaction Attendant.
Design and implement customizations in Interaction Designer.
Utilize and understand workforce management concepts.
Utilize and understand speech analytics concepts.
Engage in hands-on coding and development.

education_certification.credential: BA, BS or equivalent experience in related field preferred, Advance Degree may be required.
Working knowledge of two or more technologies preferred.
Familiarity with networking concepts and troubleshooting preferred.
Proven experience and knowledge with MS SQL database programming preferred.
Proven experience and knowledge in the GenesysPureConnect platform preferred.
Experience with SAP CRM or Salesforce.com a plus.
